# unifi_static_dns (Resource)

Manages a UniFi static DNS record.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "unifi_static_dns" "home_assistant" {
  key         = "ha.local"
  value       = "192.168.1.20"
  record_type = "A"
  enabled     = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `key` (String) The hostname for the DNS record.
- `value` (String) The value (IP or hostname) for the DNS record.

### Optional

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the DNS record is enabled.
- `record_type` (String) The type of the DNS record (e.g., A, CNAME). Defaults to 'A'.
- `ttl` (Number) The TTL for the DNS record.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of the DNS record.
